meanings.sent1: The farmhouse had a red roof.
meanings.sent2: We visited the farmhouse to see the animals.
meanings.sent3: The farmhouse decided to throw a party for the barn animals.
meanings.sent4: The farmhouse stood tall like a guardian of the fields.
meanings.sent5: The farmhouse nestled among the golden wheat fields, a beacon of rural life.

meanings.definition: A building used for agricultural purposes.
meanings.sent1: The old farmhouse stored tools and equipment.
meanings.sent2: The farmhouse was filled with the scent of freshly harvested crops.
meanings.sent3: The farmhouse tried its hand at farming, but the cows were better at it.
meanings.sent4: The farmhouse hummed with the energy of a bustling harvest season.
meanings.sent5: The farmhouse was the heart of the farm, where work and life intertwined.
